title: Zolostays foray into luxury hotel space with launch of Hotel Z Triloha in Bengaluru
description: "Our entry into the luxury segment with this launch in Bangalore marks a significant milestone in our expansion plans. Our expansion strategy is built on extensive market research and a deep understanding of local culture and regulations, coupled with an unwavering commitment to excellence," said Nikhil Sikri, Co-founder and CEO of ZoloStays.
